dct_title_s: Die gantze Welt in ein Kleberblat, welches ist der Stadt Hannover, meines lieben Vaterlandes Wapen
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Appears in Bünting's Itinerarium Sacrae Scripturae. In top left margin: 4. In top right margin: 5. The world is portrayed as a clover leaf. Signature mark: ij.
